DPRK Delegation Leaves for Britain 
   Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State Maritime Supervision Bureau led by its Director Ko Nung Du left here on Tuesday to participate in the 25th general assembly of the International Maritime Organization to be held in Britain.
